typography.title: Typography
typography.poppins: Designed by Jonny Pinhorn and Ninad Kale, Poppins is a modern and versatile sans-serif font that works well in a variety of contexts. Its clean and contemporary design makes it suitable for projects seeking a fresh and modern look. Poppins has been designed with excellent readability, especially at smaller font sizes. Poppins is a Google Fonts font, which means it is easily accessible and usable in web projects.
typography.roboto: Designed by Christian Robertson, Roboto has a dual nature. It has a mechanical skeleton and the shapes are largely geometric. At the same time, the fountain features friendly, open curves. While some grotesques distort the shape of their letters to force a rigid rhythm, Roboto makes no compromises and allows the letters to adjust to their natural width. This creates a more natural reading rhythm that is more commonly found in humanistic and serif type.
